tag_professor: Caring (4)  Gives good feedback (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Respected (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Inspirational (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
stu_tags: GIVES GOOD FEEDBACK  SKIP CLASS? YOU WON\'T PASS.  RESPECTED
comments: This professor is hecka funny, very engaged with the students, listens to your concerns. The grading is clear, lets you know what she wants. I wish she would use canvas, it\'s disconcerting when you know how you are doing in all your classes except this one!! Other than that, I highly recommend this professor, and this class!

tag_professor: Caring (4)  Gives good feedback (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Respected (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Inspirational (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: She assigns homework, but doesn\'t collect it. She\'ll end up reviewing it during class. Very understanding and caring.

tag_professor: Caring (4)  Gives good feedback (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Respected (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Inspirational (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: Yup! THE teacher to take in any language! I begrudgingly took the class to fulfill my req for Berkeley and now I wish the class would never end! She makes learning fun and easy. She is so supportive and encouraging it gives you the feeling that you can do it! Best teacher ever and overall wonderful person!

tag_professor: Caring (4)  Gives good feedback (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Respected (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Inspirational (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)

comments: Wonderful teacher! Loved her both semesters I had her, get ready for some laughs, get ready to work; taking SPAN001, get ready to take SPAN002 and 003 with her!

tag_professor: Caring (4)  Gives good feedback (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Respected (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Inspirational (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
stu_tags: LECTURE HEAVY  CLEAR GRADING CRITERIA  CARING
comments: Not to strict on the grading, as long as you get the idea of what is being said and can translate it then she will give you most of the points. A little bit of extra credit here and there to help keep your grade up. The homework is ridiculous though, 30 page workbook for 10 points, a paragraph in the bluebook 10 points, exams are usually 50 points

tag_professor: Caring (4)  Gives good feedback (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Respected (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Inspirational (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: Pirott is definitely one of the most caring teacher I have ever met. She also takes the time to make sure everyone understands the material, challenges you to improve, and is available to help. I would say she\'s one of the best Spanish teachers at Solano.

tag_professor: Caring (4)  Gives good feedback (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Respected (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Inspirational (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: the sweetest most caring professor goes out of her way to make sure you understand the material and is always willing to explain anything no matter how many times you ask

tag_professor: Caring (4)  Gives good feedback (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Respected (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Inspirational (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: Profe. Pirott is the best! I had her for Spanish 1, 2, and conversational. She is really engaging and wants students to learn. You will not be disappointed.

tag_professor: Caring (4)  Gives good feedback (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Respected (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Inspirational (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: One of the BEST teachers I have ever had. VERY organized. She wrote a lot of great notes on the board that were easy to follow and copy. She took time to explain everything very clearly. She made learning Spanish fun and easy. She also has a fun sense of humor. Her test are very straight forward and she gives an outline of what will be on there

tag_professor: Caring (4)  Gives good feedback (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Respected (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Inspirational (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: Amazing teacher. She is always happy and genuinely enjoys what she does. She patiently explains grammar again and again. You can tell she really wants you to understand and is willing to work with you in anyway you need.

tag_professor: Caring (4)  Gives good feedback (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Respected (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Inspirational (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: BEST TEACHER IN SOLANO! I had her for Spanish 001 and Spanish 002 and she has been very helpful. If you attend class and do the homework and ask questions, there should be no reason not to get an A in her class.

tag_professor: Caring (4)  Gives good feedback (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Respected (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Inspirational (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: She is such a nice lady! Gives clear instructions and is lenient with late work. She assigns a lot of busywork, but it\'s nothing too hard if you are decent at spanish. Really cares about her students and is not a hard grader. I highly recommend her for anyone wanting to learn/practice their spanish!

tag_professor: Caring (4)  Gives good feedback (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Respected (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Inspirational (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: Great professor & very clear. If this is your first foreign language, she will make sure you understand. Very funny & down-to-earth. I have never had a single complaint about her class. She has a lot of office hours for extra help! Choose Profa Laura!

tag_professor: Caring (4)  Gives good feedback (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Respected (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Inspirational (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: Amazing professor! Enjoys teaching and is there to help, not just get students in and out like some other profs. If you want to take Spanish take it with profe Laura!

tag_professor: Caring (4)  Gives good feedback (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Respected (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Inspirational (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: I hated Spanish before taking her class, but I really enjoyed going to class, and I learned ALOT. She is a FANTASTIC teacher, very helpful, and good at explaining things if you don\'t understand. She also tries to make class fun, and isn\'t boring to listen to when she lectures.If I had to take Spn again I would take her! GREAT TEACHER!!!!! and fun!

comments: I didn\'t like her class. It was like I was in high school again. People talking, eating and coming in 45 mins late in an hour class. It was frustrating and she didn\'t care. She taught the class as if we all had Span. in high school. Her grading system is confusing. Take Abel-Q.
